mapper.sql: PKID, PART_CODE, CASE_CODE, REAL_HT_TIME, HOUSE_HODING_TAX, PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX, BUSINESS_TAX, CONTRACT_TAX, LAND_INCREMENT_TAX,USE_CARD_PAY,CARD_PAY_AMOUNT
mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER (PKID, PART_CODE, CASE_CODE, REAL_HT_TIME, HOUSE_HODING_TAX, PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX, BUSINESS_TAX, CONTRACT_TAX, LAND_INCREMENT_TAX, COMMENT,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,CREATE_BY,UPDATE_BY) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realHtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{houseHodingTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{personalIncomeTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{businessTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{contractTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{landIncrementTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},GETDATE(),GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},@{SESSION_USER_ID})

insert into sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER
PKID,
PART_CODE,
CASE_CODE,
REAL_HT_TIME,
HOUSE_HODING_TAX,
PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX,
BUSINESS_TAX,
CONTRACT_TAX,
LAND_INCREMENT_TAX,
COMMENT,
USE_CARD_PAY,
CARD_PAY_AMOUNT,
CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,CREATE_BY,UPDATE_BY,
#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{realHtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{houseHodingTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{personalIncomeTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{businessTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{landIncrementTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{useCardPay,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{cardPayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GETDATE(),GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},@{SESSION_USER_ID},
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER
PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REAL_HT_TIME = #{realHtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HOUSE_HODING_TAX = #{houseHodingTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX = #{personalIncomeTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUSINESS_TAX = #{businessTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTRACT_TAX = #{contractTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAND_INCREMENT_TAX = #{landIncrementTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
USE_CARD_PAY= #{useCardPay,jdbcType=CHAR},
CARD_PAY_AMOUNT=#{cardPayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATE_TIME=GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY=@{SESSION_USER_ID},
,IS_ACTIVE='1' where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER set PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_HT_TIME = #{realHtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HOUSE_HODING_TAX = #{houseHodingTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX = #{personalIncomeTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUSINESS_TAX = #{businessTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTRACT_TAX = #{contractTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAND_INCREMENT_TAX = #{landIncrementTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME=GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY=@{SESSION_USER_ID} ,IS_ACTIVE='1' where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER set PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_HT_TIME = #{realHtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HOUSE_HODING_TAX = #{houseHodingTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX = #{personalIncomeTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUSINESS_TAX = #{businessTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTRACT_TAX = #{contractTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAND_INCREMENT_TAX = #{landIncrementTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},UPDATE_TIME=GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY=@{SESSION_USER_ID} ,IS_ACTIVE='1' where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(CASE_CODE) AS countGHS FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE WHERE CASE_CODE IN((SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER WHERE datediff(month,sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER.REAL_HT_TIME,getdate())=0)) AND CASE_CODE IN( ( select CASE_CODE from sctrans.T_TO_CASE WHERE 1=1 AND LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )UNION( SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR WHERE 1=1 AND PROCESSOR_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
)

SELECT COUNT(CASE_CODE) AS countGHS FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE WHERE CASE_CODE IN((SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER WHERE convert(char(7) ,sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER.REAL_HT_TIME, 120) = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ))
AND LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #{leadingProcessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT COUNT(CASE_CODE) AS countGHS FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE WHERE CASE_CODE IN((SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER WHERE convert(char(7) ,sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER.REAL_HT_TIME, 120) = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ))
AND ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT convert(char(7) ,CREATE_TIME , 120) as createTime, COUNT(CASE_CODE) as countGHS FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE WHERE CASE_CODE IN((SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER WHERE datediff(year,CREATE_TIME,getdate())=0)) AND CASE_CODE IN
(SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR WHERE 1=1
AND ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) GROUP BY convert(char(7) ,CREATE_TIME , 120)

SELECT convert(char(7) ,CREATE_TIME , 120) as createTime, COUNT(CASE_CODE) as countGHS FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE WHERE CASE_CODE IN((SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER WHERE datediff(year,CREATE_TIME,getdate())=0)) AND CASE_CODE IN
(SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR WHERE 1=1 AND ORG_ID IN #{item})
GROUP BY convert(char(7) ,CREATE_TIME , 120)

SELECT convert(char(7) ,CREATE_TIME , 120) as createTime, COUNT(CASE_CODE) as countGHS FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE WHERE CASE_CODE IN((SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER WHERE datediff(year,CREATE_TIME,getdate())=0)) AND LEADING_PROCESS_ID IN #{item}
GROUP BY convert(char(7) ,CREATE_TIME , 120)
